lines.text:
[of Paco]
He was my man. But you only betray a Mexican woman once.
[last lines, after Kowalski has saved Paco from a surprise attack from Colonel Garcia]
Good luck, Paco! Keep dreaming... but with your eyes open!
Never question a man who pays well.

[narrating]
So, Paco Roman is a clown. Well, better a live clown than a dead hero. As I, Sergei Kowalski, Polish emigrate to the New World, always realised...
[fade-in to flashback of Paco working in a mine]
When our story began, Paco was only a peon. But one... with a difference.

[narrating]
Not far away was Curly's place, and Curly himself. Powerful. Rich. The Boss.
And in case of emergencies, there's this...
[produces a miniature revolver, prompting the player to hand over his money]
